cs213.photoAlbum.model

Class Photo

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.model.Photo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Photo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class encapsulates a Photo object and methods needed for altering attributes of this Photo. Implements Serializable, converting an instance Photo object into a sequence of bytes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Photo

        public Photo(java.lang.String filename,
             java.lang.String caption)
        Constructs photo object from filename and caption
        Parameters:
        filename - Name of file that must exist on disk
        caption - Photo's caption to be associated with photo object across all albums it's added to

        Parameters:

      • removeTag

        public void removeTag(Tag tag)
        Removes tag identified by type and value from this photo object
        Parameters:
        tag - Tag object to be removed

      • hasTag

        public boolean hasTag(Tag tag)
        Checks if a photo contains a tag
        Parameters:
        tag - Tag object to be checked for existence
        Returns:
        True if and only if this photo object has tag identified by type and value, or just value if type is unknown.

        Called when photo is added to an album, this method is used for book keeping.
